quotes.quote: He's a looney. Just like his tunes.
quotes.name: Bats

quotes.quote: Retarded means slow. Was he slow?
quotes.name: Doc

quotes.quote: Don't feed me any more lines from 'Monsters, Inc.' It pisses me off!
quotes.name: Doc

quotes.quote: Buddy, Bats, Darling, they're all code names, nicknames. Monikers.
quotes.name: Buddy

quotes.quote: One more job and we're straight. Now I don't think I need to give you the speech about what would happen if you say no, how I could break your legs and kill everyone you love because you already know that, don't you?
quotes.name: Doc

quotes.quote: The moment you catch feelings is the moment you catch a bullet.
quotes.name: Bats

quotes.quote: Wait, wait, wait! I got to start the song over.
quotes.name: Baby

quotes.quote: The target is an armored truck at Perimeter Trust in Dunwoody, 10 a.m. sharp. The switch carâ€™s ready, but you want me to hit the long state parking structure and get a heist vehicle to the states colder longer. It needs to be ready for an 8:30 start.
quotes.name: Baby
